description:
Team France does the unthinkable and sets fire to the island in the hopes of stripping away Team Japan’s chances of winning. Yuichiki Kirisaki and Chairman Lemay aren’t just out to beat Team Japan… they want them dead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza Oyoge!! Minami no Shima no Tai-Yaki-kun!
Nage ! Le taiyaki de l`île tropicale !
Now Swim!! Taiyaki of the Southern Island!
ว่ายน้ำเข้า!! ไทยากิคุงแห่งเกาะตอนใต้!
いざ泳げ!! 南の島のタイ焼きくん!
